values: （大学）校园；校区；学校场地；园区；院区

synonym.mean: 校园；大学，大学生活；校园内的草地

sample.mean: n. 战役；战斗；运动
n. 宿营者；露营者；野营者；野营车；处于某种情绪中的人；有篷卡车

n. 对话
n. 天才；非凡创造力；天赋；天分；天才人物；特别能干的人；守护神；普遍特征；民族精神；时代精神

word_group.brief_definition: 大学校园；高校校园；学院校园
校外的；在校外；离开校园
校园图书馆；大学图书馆；校区图书馆
校园访问；校园游；校园参观

bilingual.source: The campus was still quiet, so Meng Hao decided to explore.
bilingual.target: 校园还很安静，所以孟浩决定去探索。

bilingual.source: I opened her window and gazed out across the university campus.
bilingual.target: 我打开她的窗户，凝视着大学校园。

bilingual.source: Explore your school campus to find out what different types of plants grow there.
bilingual.target: 探索你的校园，找出那里生长的不同种类的植物。

bilingual.source: The campus was still quiet when I arrived, so I decided to explore a bit.
bilingual.target: 当我到达时，校园仍然很安静，所以我决定稍微探索一下。
校园网覆盖了整个校园。
我非常享受我的校园生活。

bilingual.source: She likes to take walks on the campus.
The campus of HIT is very beautiful.
bilingual.target: 哈工大的校园非常美丽。

bilingual.source: He got lost on the university campus.
bilingual.target: 他在大学校园里迷路了。

bilingual.source: The campus of Harvard is very beautiful.

yingyinNormal.en: He's my pastor. He's the head of Campus Faith. He was supposed to pick up some reading plans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，他是我的牧师，他是"校园信仰"的负责人，他本该来拿我的阅读计划的。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to wrap up by saying that being here on the Oxford campus really makes me nostalgic for my days at Williams.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后我想说，在这里，在牛津校园，真的让我想起了过去在威廉姆斯的日子。

yingyinNormal.en: There are these two professors who are joining my department and I have to meet them here and show them around campus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有两个教授要加入我的部门，而我要在这里跟他们碰面，然后带他们到校园看看。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No, the campus isn't safe at night. There's raccoons and undergrads just walking around like they own the place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，校园晚上不安全。那里不但有浣熊还有大学生到处走好像那是他们的地盘一样。

yingyinNormal.en: What an amazing campus. I mean, look at these cool buildings. And did you guys see the turtles? And check this out. A reflecting pond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这校园太棒了！看那些楼都超酷的，你们有看到乌龟吗？再看看这个明镜般的池塘。

yingyinNormal.en: Think about it, I'm about to live on a campus full of Alexes. That's bound to get annoying. And when it does, who better to deal with an Alex than you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想看，整个校园里都是艾丽克斯，一定会很让人抓狂的。到时候除了你还能有谁帮我应付艾丽克斯？

yingyinNormal.en: It's somewhere in here. Dani Littlejohn got out of the campus pool at 5:12.
yingyinNormal.zh: 应该就在这段时间中，达妮·利特约翰5点12分离开校泳池。

yingyinNormal.en: Seems to me like everyone on campus wants to be your friend. Unless we lose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好像学校里所有人都想和你做朋友。除非我们输了。

yingyinNormal.en: Check it, there's a lab on campus where they do experiments on you for 50 bucks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看，学校里有个实验室，拿你做实验还给你50块钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Grant and Ms. Littlejohn, in fact, were members of the same off-campus club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，格兰特先生和利特约翰女士是同一个校外俱乐部的会员。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeffrey never knew Dani Littlejohn, never met her, never even said hello to her on campus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰弗里不认识也没见过达妮·利特约翰，更没有在学校里跟她打过招呼。

yingyinNormal.en: The campus offers a wide variety of majors, but the crown jewel of MU is the Scaring School.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学校开设各式各样的科系，但最热门的就是惊吓学院。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you know how Amy's the coolest girl on campus, right? No. No. Oh yeah, everybody thinks so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米是大学里最酷的女生，不是吗？当然不是。当然不是。真的， 大家都这么觉得。

yingyinNormal.en: This club, was run by a campus math professor, so Mr. Polmar's. And what about Mr. Grant's alibi?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个俱乐部是校内一位数学教授管理的，所以波尔马先生的。格兰特先生的不在场证明呢？

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't sit down, I'm gonna tell every girl on campus that you belong to the bravest girl that I have ever met.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不坐下，我就对学校里的每个女孩说，你属于我见过的最勇敢的这个女孩。

yingyinNormal.en: To take home the trophy, you must be the most fearsome monsters on campus. So good luck, and may the best monsters win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但仔细听好，冠军必须是全校最可怕的怪兽。祝好运，愿最厉害的怪兽获胜。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Wait, wait, wait, if Tam knows what he did, we can just ask him. He's gonna be on campus tomorrow showing his son around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等。等等，如果丹知道自己做了什么，我们可以直接问他。他明天要带儿子来学校参观呢。

yingyinNormal.en: You just said the winners are the most fearsome monsters on campus. If I win, it means you kicked out the best Scarer in the whole school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你刚说冠军是全校最可怕的怪兽，我赢了就表示你踢走了全校最厉害的惊吓学生。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm on the day care's Web site. Stop looking at that. The day care's great. It's on campus. My office is two minutes away. There's nothing to worry about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在看托儿所的网站。不用看了。那家托儿所很赞。就在我校区里。离我办公室就两分钟路程。没什么好担心的。

yingyinNormal.en: What? We're arresting Mr. Grant for the murder of Dani Littlejohn, a college student who was found outside her dorm on the Chicago Polytech campus last August with blunt trauma to her skull.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？我们以谋杀达妮·利特约翰的指控逮捕格兰特先生，死者为芝加哥理工学生，于去年八月在宿舍门口身亡，死因是头部受到钝物重击。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them

examination_example.sentence: Write an email to all international experts on <highlight>campus</highlight> inviting them to attend the graduation ceremony.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给校园里所有的国际专家写一封邮件，邀请他们参加毕业典礼。

examination_example.sentence: It seems worthless to take off-<highlight>campus</highlight> courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选修校外课程似乎一文不值。

examination_example.sentence: Sadly, the spirit of inquiry once at home on <highlight>campus</highlight> has been replaced by the use of the humanities and social sciences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可悲的是，曾经在校园里的探究精神已经被人文和社会科学所取代。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them

examination_example.sentence: The only way college could be free is if the faculty and staff donated their time and <highlight>campuses</highlight> required no utilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让大学免费的唯一方式就是，教职工能无偿付出他们的时间，并且校园也不需要水电等公共服务。

examination_example.sentence: A decision one leader said was bolstered by an analysis of spending at each <highlight>campus</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位领导表示，对每个校区支出的分析支持了这一决定。

examination_example.sentence: Outgoing Chancellor said an internal analysis showed that each <highlight>campus</highlight> spending on facilities management fell well below the industry standards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即将离任的校长说，内部分析表明，每个校园在设施管理上的支出都大大低于行业标准。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them

examination_example.sentence: It is an opportunity for freshmen to socialize with each other while further engaging with <highlight>campus</highlight> faculty and staff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于新生来说，这是一个与彼此进行社交的机会，同时也能进一步与校园教职员工进行交流。

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you have just participated in a school project of collecting used books on <highlight>campus</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你刚刚参加了一个学校收集校园旧书的项目。

examination_example.sentence: Asian-American students have been eager participants in a state program that permits them to take summer classes off <highlight>campus</highlight> for high school credit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚裔美国学生一直热衷于参加一个州项目，该项目允许他们在校外修读暑期课程以获得高中学分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them

examination_example.sentence: Most universities host welcome events before the academic year officially begins, including freshmen orientations (迎新会), <highlight>campus</highlight> picnics, and entertainments like concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大学在学年正式开始前都会举办欢迎活动，包括新生迎新会、校园野餐和音乐会等娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: Many buildings on the <highlight>campus</highlight> are his original creations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 校园里的许多建筑都是他的原创作品。

examination_example.sentence: The style of the <highlight>campus</highlight> is quite different from that of most Chinese universities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个校园的风格与大多数中国大学有很大的不同。

examination_example.sentence: It is said that we will use robots on <highlight>campus</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据说我们将会在校园里使用机器人。
